comments_since_last_sample.body: My parents love their pecan cookies…and these are their favorites ones ❤️
Totally making this for thanksgiving :)
My favorite cookie!  Thank you.
Thank you! Now I get to make one of my childhood favorites! I was think about buying some the other day 😂

I have to say I’m a bit surprised that as much as you love, LOVE vanilla, you don’t make your own.  It’s krazy easy and the results are way beyond incredible.  I have a pint canning jar w Bonded Bourbon as the liquid followed by several vanilla beans which is now over 2 yrs old along with a 1 cup vanilla bottle now filled with Ciroque vodka and vanilla beans.  Both are truly the best ever vanilla extracts and just so very easy to make and then enjoy 😊
This looks so yummy!

LOL, I just spent my morning making vanishing (blended oatmeal) oatmeal cookies with pecans and chocolate chips. Will try making this tomorrow morning after church. I have a fresh bottle of Cardamom (and anise) ready to go for the holidays. Thank you, John!

AMAZING. Haven't been able to get anything done because I have been binging on these incredibly addicting vids!  Can't wait to make these. 
PS 
They are puurrrfect, but since you forced me to tell you what flavor I would add...maybe maple?
Thanks you!
We all knew that John would add a bit too much flour doing it that dump and measure way!  But it’s more exciting to cook that way. 😁
Yummiest pretty kitchen I love your coooking cakes
Mr Kanell thank you for your videos. You have given our mixed (Swedish, American and Mexican) family so much joy. Please make a cookbook that we can buy!!
Yummy Almont extract would be delicious 😋 love your recipe 🥰
👀I love pecans❤️John why you doing this to me? I’m on a diet 😩 I need these cookies in my life right NOW!!!

Looks soo delicious!!!
Let's go Brandon!!
I would love if these had cinnamon 😍 😋
Love your tips for perfect cookies. They will come in handy for Christmas.
Fond memories of this cookie. My dad's fave. I think I will make a nice big box for him over the holidays.
